headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get The Sasquatch Outfit and Death Mask
content: Once a campfire legend and the protagonist of many a childhood bad dream, the Sasquatch Outfit is a wearable nightmare. Log in and play GTA Online on October 31 to receive this rare outfit for free. And scare the devil out of everyone you meet by claiming and wearing the Death mask, made famous in Judgement Day, available to all GTA Online players this week.
